Her Name Was Lisa opens at the funeral of a New York hooker. 
The story emerges in flashbacks of the quality time each mourner spent infecting her life. 
Lisa (Samantha Fox) is a grizzled hooker who hates everyone and everybody, most of all herself. She works in low level whorehouses where she's the pick of the litter. Lisa falls for the model's former hustle by a blonde photographer. 
However, it's the photographer's backer who's had the yen for her all along. 
She debases him verbally and gets into total dominatrix leather. 
Ultimately, she balls him up the ass with a strap-on to fulfill his secret desires. At one point, the startled photographer walks in on them. 
While lost and turned out, Lisa meets Vanessa Del Rio, who introduces her to the speedballs that lead to her death. 
Like most Samantha Fox vehicles, Samantha's common law husband, Bobby Astyr, joins in the party.
